hero.title: Where We Serve
hero.subtitle: Professional cleaning services throughout Greater Miami

intro.title: Serving All of Miami-Dade County
intro.description: CMK Home Services is proud to serve residential and commercial clients throughout Miami and surrounding areas. Whether you're in a downtown high-rise, a beachfront condo, or a suburban home, our professional cleaning team is ready to help.

reviews.title: Hear From Families Who Trust CMK Home Services
reviews.subtitle: We partner with families across Miami to deliver exceptional cleaning services. Real stories from real clients keep us accountable and help future customers feel confident.
reviews.testimonial_placeholder: Tell others about your cleaning service, our team, or your home's transformation.
reviews.testimonial_help: Minimum 10 characters. Mention specifics like service type, quality, or our team.
reviews.sign_in_desc: Sign in to rate your experience and help other families choose their trusted cleaning partner.
reviews.no_reviews_title: Reviews will appear here once clients start sharing their experience.
reviews.no_reviews_desc: Be the first to leave a review after your service!

items.quote: Gloria and her team are amazing! They transformed our condo and now we have them come weekly. Professional and trustworthy.
items.author: Maria C.

items.quote: Best cleaning service in Miami! They handle our vacation rental turnovers and the place is always spotless for our guests.
items.author: David & Elena R.

items.quote: We use CMK for our snowbird property. They keep our place fresh while we are up north and it is always perfect when we return.
items.author: Robert T.

difference.description: Founded by Gloria, a Miami resident passionate about creating clean, healthy spaces for families and businesses. We bring professionalism, reliability, and attention to detail to every job.

services_intro.description: From residential homes to commercial spaces, we offer comprehensive cleaning services tailored to your needs. All services include eco-friendly products and satisfaction guarantee.

residential.title: Residential Care
residential.description: Weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly upkeep tailored to your lifestyle.

commercial.title: Commercial Suites
commercial.description: Boutique offices, showrooms, and retail spaces refreshed after hours.

windows.title: Windows & Finishes
windows.description: Crystal-clear windows, mirrors, and stainless detailing throughout.

deep_clean.title: Deep Restore
deep_clean.description: Move-in/out, post-renovation, and seasonal detailing for every surface.

premier_weekly.name: Premier Residence Care
premier_weekly.description: Weekly white-glove clean with linen service, organization touch-ups, and seasonal detailing scheduled quarterly.

signature_biweekly.name: Signature Bi-Weekly
signature_biweekly.description: Detailed bi-weekly clean focused on kitchens, baths, and high-touch living spaces using non-toxic products.

deep_restore.name: Seasonal Deep Restore
deep_restore.description: Top-to-bottom seasonal refresh covering baseboards, fixtures, interiors of cabinetry, and outdoor living spaces.

about.title: A Passion for Clean, Healthy Spaces
about.description: Gloria founded CMK Home Services with a simple mission: to provide Miami families and businesses with reliable, professional cleaning services they can trust. With years of experience and a dedicated team, we treat every home and office like it's our own.

membership.title: Ready for a spotless space?
membership.description: Contact us today for a free quote. We serve all of Miami and surrounding areas with flexible scheduling to fit your needs.

contact_section.title: Let's design a cleaning schedule around your life.
contact_section.description: Share your preferred cadence, square footage, and any concierge notes. We'll send a tailored proposal within one business day.
areas: Miami Beach · Coral Gables · Coconut Grove
contact_section.areas_note: Looking outside these neighborhoods? Reach out—our concierge will confirm availability.

hero.title: Cleaning programs tailored to Miami living
hero.description: From boutique residences to executive suites, every service reflects the craftsmanship and flexibility you expect. Whether you need recurring weekly care or turnover coordination for seasonal rentals, our concierge approach delivers predictable pricing, responsive scheduling, and teams trained in high-end finishes.

metrics.label: Years taking care of Miami properties

items: Dedicated concierge for scheduling and quality checks
Recurring teams familiar with your property and preferences
Transparent pricing—no hidden fees or surprise add-ons
White-glove care for delicate surfaces and luxury finishes

what_is_included.title: What is included
what_is_included.description: Every visit follows a documented checklist tailored to your property.

our_process.title: Our process
our_process.description: Transparent milestones keep the work predictable and stress-free.

cta_card.description: We will tailor a scope, share pricing, and coordinate the first visit within 24 hours.

overview.title: Explore every program at a glance

bottom_cta.title: Let's design a cleaning plan around your lifestyle.
bottom_cta.description: Share cadence, square footage, finishes, and any concierge notes. We'll send a tailored proposal with transparent pricing and scheduling options.

common_faqs.question: How do I get a quote?
common_faqs.answer: Contact us via WhatsApp at (786) 380-7579, call, or submit the form on our contact page. We respond within one business day.

common_faqs.question: Are you licensed and insured?
common_faqs.answer: Yes. CMK Home Services is fully licensed, insured, and bonded for residential and commercial work across Miami-Dade.

common_faqs.question: What areas do you serve?
common_faqs.answer: We cover the greater Miami area including Miami Beach, Bal Harbour, Aventura, Sunny Isles, Broward, and surrounding neighborhoods.

residential.title: Residential Cleaning
residential.description: Detailed upkeep for primary and secondary residences. We care for every room with hotel-level finishing touches and concierge-style scheduling.
features: Kitchen care with appliance wipe-downs and polish
Bathroom sanitation with descaling and fixture buffing
Floor care for marble, hardwood, and luxury vinyl
Bed linen refresh and light laundry on request
Interior windows, mirrors, and glass accents

process.title: Concierge intake
process.description: Share square footage, finishes, and preferences with our scheduler.

process.title: Personalized checklist
process.description: We document every room and assign a recurring team to your home.

process.title: White-glove clean
process.description: Professionals arrive in uniform with commercial-grade supplies and protection gear.

process.title: Quality assurance
process.description: Supervisors perform periodic inspections and adjust to your feedback.

trust_badges: Background-checked team assigned to your home
Discreet service with secured entry instructions

faqs.question: Can I meet the team before service?
faqs.answer: Yes. We can arrange an introduction or virtual walkthrough so you feel confident before the first visit.

faqs.question: Do you bring cleaning products?
faqs.answer: We supply professional-grade products and equipment. If you prefer a specific brand, we are happy to use it.

faqs.question: What if I am not home?
faqs.answer: Most clients provide secure access instructions. We will lock up and send photo confirmation once finished.

commercial.title: Commercial Cleaning
commercial.description: Daytime or after-hours cleaning for boardrooms, boutiques, medical suites, and creative studios. We keep client-facing spaces spotless without disrupting operations.
features: Floor care for carpet, tile, and polished concrete

process.title: Site walk-through
process.description: We review access, security, and compliance requirements.

process.title: Proposal & schedule
process.description: Receive a transparent scope with cadence, supplies, and reporting cadence.

process.title: Dedicated crew
process.description: A trained team follows your SOPs with supervisor oversight.

process.title: Reporting & optimization
process.description: We deliver visit summaries and adjust scopes as your workplace evolves.

trust_badges: Certificate of insurance provided on request

faqs.question: Do you offer day porter services?
faqs.answer: Yes. We can staff day porters for high-traffic lobbies or restrooms while a night crew handles deep cleaning.

faqs.question: Can you support inspections or audits?
faqs.answer: We document every visit, maintain SDS sheets, and prepare compliance checklists for regulated industries.

windows.title: Windows & Glass Care
windows.tagline: Crystal-clear views of the Miami skyline
windows.description: Interior and exterior window cleaning for condos, estates, and storefronts. Salt air, sunscreen, and daily storms are no match for our glass specialists.

quick_facts.label: Access
quick_facts.value: Up to 4 stories (higher via partner lift)

features: Sliding door and balcony glass polishing
Mirror, shower glass, and railing care

process.title: Assessment & access plan
process.description: We evaluate exposure, hose access, and any HOA requirements.

process.title: Protection setup
process.description: Furniture, floors, and landscaping are covered before we start.

process.title: Detail clean
process.description: Squeegee technique plus microfiber finishing for a streak-free result.

process.title: Final inspection
process.description: We inspect in daylight and invite you to review every pane.

faqs.question: Do you clean high-rise exteriors?
faqs.answer: Yes. We partner with certified rope-access teams for buildings above four stories and manage all permits.

faqs.question: How often should windows be cleaned in Miami?
faqs.answer: Most clients schedule quarterly service to stay ahead of sea salt, humidity, and afternoon storms.

organization.title: Home Organization
organization.tagline: Systems that look beautiful and stay tidy
organization.description: Professional organizers declutter closets, pantries, garages, and home offices so every item has a place and your daily routines feel calm.
features: Maintenance visits to keep systems on track

process.title: Discovery session
process.description: We learn how you live in the space plus your aesthetic preferences.

process.title: Design & sourcing
process.description: You receive a layout and curated product list before we begin.

process.title: Edit & implement
process.description: Our team declutters, installs solutions, and styles every shelf.

process.title: Lifestyle coaching
process.description: We show you how to maintain the system and offer follow-up support.

trust_badges: Product sourcing and installation handled for you

faqs.question: Do I need to be present?
faqs.answer: We recommend attending the edit phase, then you can step away while we install and style the space.

faqs.question: Can you work with existing containers?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We repurpose what you own and supplement only when needed.

deep_clean.title: Deep Cleaning
deep_clean.description: Intensive detailing before special events, after renovations, or whenever you want the feeling of a brand-new home.
features: Baseboards, trim, and crown molding hand-wiped
Appliance interiors including oven and fridge
Tile and grout scrubbing with steam option
Move furniture to capture hidden dust

process.title: Pre-clean walkthrough
process.description: We note materials, pain points, and any no-go zones.

process.title: Detail schedule
process.description: A custom checklist with estimated timing per room.

process.title: Specialty cleaning
process.description: Technicians use pro tools such as steamers and HEPA vacuums.

process.title: Satisfaction review
process.description: We review each space together or send photos if you are away.

faqs.question: Is a deep clean required before recurring service?
faqs.answer: We recommend it for first-time clients so maintenance visits stay efficient and consistent.

faqs.question: Can you include exterior areas?
faqs.answer: Yes. Balconies, summer kitchens, and patio furniture can be added to the scope.

move.title: Move-In / Move-Out
move.tagline: Immaculate homes for handoffs and arrivals
move.description: We prepare properties for listings, tenant turnovers, and fresh starts with photo-ready detailing and checklist documentation.
features: Wall smudge removal and switch plate sanitizing
Blind, window track, and sliding door care

process.title: Timeline planning
process.description: We align with closing dates, listing photography, or move-in schedules.

process.title: Vacant prep
process.description: Crews arrive after movers to address every surface.

process.title: Inspection checklist
process.description: We follow lease or builder requirements and document completion.

process.title: Final approval
process.description: Walkthrough with owner/agent or video confirmation if you are remote.

trust_badges: Rapid response crews for tight timelines
Preferred vendor for luxury property managers

faqs.question: Do you coordinate with movers or realtors?
faqs.answer: Yes. Share your contacts and we will manage access plus keep everyone updated.

faqs.question: Can you help stage the home?
faqs.answer: We can lightly stage with existing furnishings or refer you to our partner stylists.

property.title: Rental & Airbnb Care
property.tagline: Turnover services for hosts and property managers
property.description: Reliable turnovers for nightly rentals, corporate housing, and furnished apartments. Guests arrive to a five-star experience every stay.
features: Automated scheduling tied to your booking calendar
Hotel-style bed making and towel presentation

process.title: Onboarding & SOPs
process.description: We document brand standards, storage closets, and vendor contacts.

process.title: Calendar sync
process.description: Integrate with Airbnb, Hostfully, or direct booking tools.

process.title: Turnover execution
process.description: Crews follow your checklist, restock supplies, and stage decor.

process.title: Reporting & inventory
process.description: Receive before/after photos plus low-stock alerts in real time.

faqs.question: Can you manage linens and amenities?
faqs.answer: Yes. We launder on-site or off-site, track inventory, and restock amenities per reservation.

faqs.question: Do you integrate with booking software?
faqs.answer: We sync with popular PMS tools or share a shared calendar to avoid missed turnovers.

snowbird.title: Snowbird Property Care
snowbird.tagline: Peace of mind while you are away
snowbird.description: Seasonal property care that keeps residences fresh, secure, and ready for your arrival. Ideal for clients who split time between Miami and another home.

process.title: Care plan setup
process.description: We define visit cadence, vendor access, and reporting preferences.

process.title: Routine inspections
process.description: Technicians follow a 30-point checklist and send updates every visit.

process.title: Issue resolution
process.description: We coordinate trusted vendors for maintenance or repairs.

process.title: Arrival preparation
process.description: Home is detailed, stocked, and climate-controlled for your return.

trust_badges: Secure key management and alarm protocols

faqs.question: Can you accept deliveries and coordinate vendors?
faqs.answer: Yes. We can meet service providers, oversee projects, and keep you updated with photos and notes.

faqs.question: Will you prep the home before I arrive?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Expect a fresh deep clean, linens pressed, and any requested groceries or amenities stocked.

hero.title: About CMK Home Services
hero.subtitle: Professional cleaning with a personal touch in Miami

founder_story.title: Meet Gloria
paragraphs: Gloria founded CMK Home Services with a clear vision: to provide Miami families and businesses with reliable cleaning they can trust. With years of experience and a deep understanding of what makes a space feel elevated and welcoming, she built CMK on the principles of excellence, reliability, and white-glove care.
Today, Gloria leads a dedicated team of vetted professionals who share her commitment to making Miami homes and businesses spotless, one tailored cleaning plan at a time.
founder_story.quote: I started this business because too many people were struggling to find dependable, detail-oriented cleaners. I wanted a company where quality is guaranteed on every visit.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: These principles guide everything we do at CMK Home Services

items.title: Excellence
items.description: We hold ourselves to the highest standards in every cleaning job, no matter the size.

items.title: Trust
items.description: Licensed, insured, and background-checked professionals you can welcome into your home.

items.title: Care
items.description: We treat every home and business like our own, with attention to detail and respect.

items.title: Reliability
items.description: Consistent quality and punctuality—you can count on us to show up and deliver.

benefits.title: Licensed & Insured
benefits.description: Fully licensed, bonded, and insured for your peace of mind.

benefits.title: Background Checked
benefits.description: All team members undergo thorough background checks.

benefits.title: Eco-Friendly
benefits.description: Safe, effective products that protect your family and the environment.

benefits.title: 5-Star Service
benefits.description: Consistently rated 5 stars by our satisfied Miami clients.

benefits.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
benefits.description: Not happy? We make it right with priority follow-up cleaning.

benefits.title: Miami Local
benefits.description: We understand Miami homes and the unique needs of our community.

cta.title: Ready to Experience the CMK Difference?
cta.description: Join hundreds of satisfied Miami clients who trust us with their homes and businesses.
